alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Preston (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 8:34PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN FAYETTE AND NORTHEASTERN PRESTON COUNTIES THROUGH 900 PM EDT... At 834 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kingwood, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingwood, Terra Alta, Albright, Valley Point, Hazelton, and Cranesville. This includes Interstate 68 in West Virginia between mile markers 29 and 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southwestern Pennsylvania...and northeastern West Virginia.
